Models¶

class cart.models.Cart(*args, **kwargs)¶

Model with a list of products in each user’s carts.

Parameters:

  • id (BigAutoField) – Primary key: ID

  • quantity (PositiveIntegerField) – Количество

Relationship fields:

Parameters:

  • user (ForeignKey to User) – Пользователь (related name: cart)

  • product (ForeignKey to Product) – Товар (related name: cart)
